name: Action RPG - Prototype
description:
Hey guys, this is a small action RPG game I made where the goal is to collect 5 star fragments! I hope you have fun with it! Feel free to tell me what you think! I made this to help me master visual scripting, so the goal was not to completely polish it. Even so, I thought I would upload it!! So, do you think I should continue it and make it a full game? What do you think? Thanks!

Cheers!

CONTROLS:

Use ASD and W (or arrows) to control the player

Right Mouse Btn or H or Arrows (shoots to mouse position)

Left Mouse Btn or J for Sword

Block with K (all except fire arrows)

Interact with E (when something to interact is there)

Dash is F 

Collect 5 star fragments to win! 

Want me to write code for your game? You can contact me on Discord with the name "AstraGamesStudios" or, via email, at: jrobertson243@outlook.com
